Description: An incredibly accurate four-seam.
An incredibly accurate two-seam.
Lowers the fielder's Speed by 1 stage.
A drag bunt that wears down the fielder 40 HP.
A shuuto with an off-center pivot.
A hard slider with a spark of electricity.
A four-seam fastball that comes like a bolt of lightning.
A highly charged two-seamer with an eratic break.
A deceiving offsepeed pitch.
Has a ~10% chance to paralyze the fielder the ball is hit to.
A four-seam fastball aimed right at the batter. 100% chance of hitting batter.
A four-seam fastball thrown inside. 50% chance of hitting batter. Can cause a batter to flinch.
Hard linedrive, right at the pitcher.
Fake a check-swing and lean into anything close.
Step out of the box and make a face. Makes pitchers throw wildly inside.
Pure fire, right down the pipe.
A four-seam fastball with some heat on it.
Some serious heat up in the zone.
A hard hit ball with a ~10% chance to burn the fielder.
A curveball that seems to drop out of the sky.
An uppercut swing with a high chance of a fly ball.
A gravity-defying four-seam with a monster spin-rate.
Takes a pitch to mock the pitcher. 20% chance of getting thrown at.
Batter digs in, takes the first pitch, and smashes anything close on the second pitch.
Squares for a bunt. Unsquares. Squares again. Takes a pitch. Confuses the pitcher.
Hard hit, pulled right down the line.
Has a ~30% chance to paralyze the fielder. This move fails against Psychic-type pitches.
A pitch that can be controlled after it's thrown
A fastball that's all over the place.
A hard hit ground ball with a chance of burning the fielder.
A hard swing with a big stick.
Takes a pitch. Lulls the pitcher to sleep.
Has a high critical hit ratio.
Bounces in the dirt.
Almost certainly a grounder. Often bounces right in front of the plate and stays in the air for a long time.
If it connects, it's gone.
On the first pitch, the batter digs in. On the second pitch, the batter attacks anything close.
Takes a pitch. Lowers the catcher's Accuracy by 1 stage.
A forkball that takes a hard turn out of the strikezone at the last second.
Looks over their shoulder. Throws to first. Has a 30% chance of freezing the runner.
A hard hit line drive that has a 10% chance of freezing the fielder.
Takes a pitch. The batter's preocupation with how cold they've gotten protects them from negative stat modifiers caused by other players until the end of the plate appearance.
Great for advancing runners.
A hard bunt meant to go past a charging infielder.
A bunt with a running start. Speed +1.

A harder fastball thrown 2-5 times in a row. This pitch has a 3/8 chance of being thrown twice, a 3/8 chance of being thrown three times, a 1/8 chance of being thrown four times, and a 1/8 chance of being thrown five times.
Takes a pitch, lowers their head, and swings hard on the next turn.
A hard swing with a high launch angle.
A straight change. Same motion as a fastball, but much slower.
Takes a pitch, steps out of the box, the crowd starts to chant. Pitcher sleeps on the runners.
A changeup thrown with the thumb and index finger touching. Breaks similar to a screwball.
A 12-6 curveball.
A good, hard swing.
A fastball that tails in from the pitcher.
A super slow pitch that drops through the strikezone. It often catches batters off guard.
A fastball that takes everything a pitcher has left.
A hard thrown ball... with an unsure grip.
At just the right angle, you can blind the pitcher flashing a bunt. Lowers the pitcher's Accuracy by 1 stage.
Takes a pitch. Increases critical hit ratio.
A changeup thrown like a splitter. Breaks with a more gental downward motion.
A cross between a split-finger pitch and a straight change.
A four-seam fastball.
Takes a pitch. Paralyzes the pitcher. Works on Ghost-type pitchers.
A pitch thrown with a spiral-like spin so that the Magnus force is in the same direction as the ball's movement.
Takes a pitch. Raises the user's Batting by 1 stage.
A tough-to-hit, tough-to-control offspeed pitch with little to no rotation on the ball.
A faster than normal curveball thrown with the index knuckle on the ball.
Crowds pay big money to see this curve.
Same motion as a fastball, but much slower.
A quick swing for contact.
Nothing but fastballs, each one thrown harder than the last.
Takes a pitch. Lowers the infield's Throwing by 1 stage.
A curveball that breaks away from the pitcher instead of inward.
A hard thrown shuuto that destroy's the pitcher's shoulder.
Similar to the screwball, the shuuto breaks away from the pitcher and can jam a hitter.
A fastball with a dropping spin. Has an increased risk of wild pitches.
Has a high critical hit ratio.
Breaks in hard from the pitcher.
A curveball with more inward than downward motion.
A hard hit ball with a good lanuch angle. Batter takes the next pitch to recover.
An eephus that restores half the pitcher's health.
A fastball thrown with the index and middle fingers split on either side of the ball. Looks like a four-seam until it drops off the table.
A hack with a big step. Has a ~30% chance to make the target balk on the next pitch.
A big swing that can muscle anything deep.

Used automatically when all of the user's other moves have run out of PP or are otherwise inaccessible. The user receives 1/4 recoil damage. Struggle is classified as a Normal-type move, so it is resisted by Rock-type Pokemon and cannot hit Ghost-type Pokemon at all.
Takes the pitch. Learns the pitch.
A knuckle scraper. Starts at the knees and finishes high.
An ugly swing that always manages to make contact.
An simple swing for contact.
A two-seam fastball with a little extra tail.
An easy pitch.
A two-seam fastball. It tails away from the pitcher.
A changeup thrown like a Star Trek greeting.
Swing... and a miss.
A filthy breaking changeup. Has a 30% chance to poison the batter.
A hard curveball with a 25% chance to poison the batter.
Straight gas. 10% chance of poisioning the batter.
A nasty puff of smoke. Good contact swing. Has a ~30% chance to poison the catcher.
A fastball that seems to jump from the mound to the plate in the blink of an eye.
A fastball with a ~30% chance to lower the batter's Batting by 1 stage.
Takes a pitch, and puts the pitcher into a trance. Pitcher sleeps on the runners.
Takes a pitch. Lowers the pitcher's Accuracy by 1 stage.
Takes a pitch. Raises the user's Batting by 1 stage.
Takes a pitch. Increases the batter's critical hit ratio.
Takes a pitch. Lowers the pitcher's Throwing by 1 stage.
Takes the next two pitches. Restores health fully.
A hard sinking fastball that never leaves the infield.
A primative chop.
A slider with with a heavy drop to it.
A slippery pitch that floats like a bubble
Has a high critical hit ratio.
A hard fastball with some sweat on it.
An absolute missile with splash damage.
A little spit on the fingers causes the ball to tumble forward. Can be wild.
A kunckleball with a flight pattern similar to a wave.
Takes a pitch. Raises the user's Batting by 1 stage.
